arts.ttl: Watch: Pulisic doubles Milan’s advantage against Napoli with deflected strike
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan made it 2-0 against Napoli in the first half as Christian Pulisic got his fourth goal of the season with a deflected shot. Just after the half-hour mark, Milan doubled their advantage and it came through Christian Pulisic.
